original_title: La Empresa Perdona un Momento de Locura
overview: A skilled worker has a sudden nervous breakdown at the company for which he has been working for the last 20 years. He attacks the machines and smashes the windows. The company decides to have him undergo treatment with a well-known young psychiatrist. She will try to bring light the reasons for his behavior  so he can adapt himself to his work once again.
title: The Company Forgives a Moment of Madness
